text: 2:10 Matyu 5:16; Filipai 2:15; Taitus 1:3Egh me, gumazir men garibar biziba okɨman markɨ. Bizir me amiba bar, men garir gumaziba dar ganɨva egh me akar e kurir kamɨn ziam fam. A God en Akurvazir Gumazimɨn akam. Me akar kamɨn ziam fɨsɨ, ingangarir gumaziba bar deravɨra men garir gumazibar akabar gɨn mangɨva arazir aghuim men akakagh.
